item.title: Day-14 (Looked into enabling emojis)
item.description: Wanted to use emojis and bit of a googling, and voila. 😄 👍 Turns out all you need to do is add this one property in config.toml enableEmoji = true And then I thought , well, lets try all of github supported emojis. Using the cheat sheet provided here gh-gist Not so sure how official this is. And now for funsies. People `` 😄 😄 😆 😆 😊 😊 😃 😃 ☺️ ☺️ 😏 😏 😍 😍 😘 😘 😚 😚 😳 😳 😌 😌 😆 😆 😁 😁 😉 😉 😜 😜 😝 😝 😀 😀 😗 😗 😙 😙 😛 😛 :sleeping: 😴 😟 :worried: 😦 😦 😧 😧 :open_mouth: 😮 :grimacing: 😬 😕 😕 😯 😯 😑 :expressionless: 😒 :unamused: 😅 :sweat_smile: 😓 😓 😥 :disappointed_relieved: 😩 😩 😔 😔 😞 😞 😖 :confounded: 😨 😨 😰 😰 😣 :persevere: 😢 😢 😭 😭 😂 😂 😲 😲 😱 😱 `` 😫 😫 😠 😠 😡 😡 😤 😤 😪 😪 😋 😋 😷 😷 😎 😎 😵 😵 👿 👿 😈 😈 😐 😐 😶 😶 😇 😇 👽 👽 💛 💛 💙 💙 💜 💜 ❤️ ❤️ 💚 💚 💔 💔 :heartbeat: 💓 💗 :heartpulse: 💕 💕 :revolving_hearts: 💞 :cupid: 💘 💖 :sparkling_heart: ✨ :sparkles: ⭐️ ⭐️ 🌟 🌟 💫 💫 💥 💥 💥 💥 💢 💢 ❗️ ❗️ ❓ ❓ ❕ ❕ ❔ ❔ :zzz: 💤 💨 💨 💦 💦 🎶 🎶 🎵 🎵 🔥 🔥 💩 💩 💩 💩 💩 💩 👍 👍 👍 👍 👎 👎 👎 👎 👌 👌 👊 👊 👊 👊 ✊ ✊ ✌️ ✌️ 👋 👋 ✋ ✋ ✋ ✋ 👐 👐 ☝️ ☝️ 👇 👇 👈 👈 👉 👉 🙌 🙌 🙏 🙏 👆 👆 👏 👏 💪 💪 🤘 🤘 🖕 🖕 🚶 🚶 🏃 🏃 🏃 🏃 👫 👫 👪 👪 👬 👬 👭 👭 💃 💃 👯 👯 🙆 🙆 🙅 🙅 💁 💁 :raising_hand: 🙋 :bride_with_veil: 👰 :person_with_pouting_face: 🙎 :person_frowning: 🙍 :bow: 🙇 :couplekiss: :couplekiss: 💑 :couple_with_heart: 💆 💆 💇 💇 💅 💅 👦 👦 👧 👧 👩 👩 👨 👨 👶 👶 👵 👵 👴 👴 👱 👱 👲 :man_with_gua_pi_mao: 👳 :man_with_turban: 👷 :construction_worker: 👮 👮 👼 👼 👸 👸 😺 😺 😸 😸 😻 :heart_eyes_cat: 😽 :kissing_cat: 😼 :smirk_cat: 🙀 🙀 😿 :crying_cat_face: 😹 😹 😾 😾 :japanese_ogre: 👹 :japanese_goblin: 👺 :see_no_evil: 🙈 :hear_no_evil: 🙉 :speak_no_evil: 🙊 :guardsman: 💂 💀 💀 🐾 🐾 👄 👄 💋 💋 💧 💧 👂 👂 👀 👀 👃 👃 👅 👅 💌 💌 👤 👤 👥 👥 💬 :speech_balloon: 💭 :thought_balloon: `` :finnadie: `` :goberserk: `` :godmode: `` :hurtrealbad: `` :rage1: `` :rage2: :rage3: `` :suspect: :trollface: Nature

item.title: Day-2 (Setting up CI for this journal)
item.description: Decided if I was going to use the journal blog, why fiddle around with source/master branch and manual pushes into master branch. Configured travis ci build script with personal access token and username to publish into master on successful builds.

item.title: Day-1 (Setting up this journal)
item.description: Started with 101daysofcode challenge. Decided on making a hugo based journal website. Found a decent theme for a journal blog, so forked it, will possibly be updating it in future. Day1’s work was to get a journal setup so its easy for me to track my progress. This journal is a hugo theme based website, the source code for which can be viewed 101daysofcode/hugo-journal
